Zeratul.name: Cleave
Zeratul.description: Deal 212 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Zeratul.name: Singularity Spike
Zeratul.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 240 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

Zeratul.name: Blink
Zeratul.description: Teleport to the target location.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

Zeratul.name: Might of the Nerazim
Zeratul.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

Zeratul.name: Void Prison
Zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

Zeratul.name: Permanent Cloak
Zeratul.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

Zeratul.name: Vorpal Blade
Zeratul.description: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

1.name: Greater Cleave
1.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

1.name: Shadow Hunter
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

4.name: Rending Cleave
4.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Psionic Strength
4.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

4.name: Darkness Descends
4.description: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

7.name: Wormhole
7.description: For 3 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

7.name: Seeker in the Dark
7.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Warp Skirmisher
7.description: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 40% more damage.

10.name: Might of the Nerazim
10.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

10.name: Void Prison
10.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

13.name: Shroud of Adun
13.description: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

13.name: Mending Strikes
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Master Warp-Blade
16.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

16.name: Void Slash
16.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Sentenced to Death
16.description: Deal 30% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

20.name: Twilight Falls
20.description: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

20.name: Gift of the Xel'naga
20.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Shadow Mending
20.description: Heal for 75% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.
